item.title: Mozia Travel Guide (Trapani (province)/Sicily/Italy/Europe)
item.description: Mozia is an island located in Sicily, Italy, which is famous for its outdoor activities, historical places, local food, and cultural attractions. This travel guide presents important places to visit, fun things to do, transportation options, local customs and culture, and much more in Mozia.
